title: App Crashes on Launch After Recent Update
description: After the latest update, many users have reported that the app crashes immediately upon launching. This issue affects various devices and prevents users from accessing the platform. A solution is critical to restoring functionality and improving user trust. A fix will be prioritized to address the crash for all affected users.

title: Text Input Field Unresponsive on Certain Android Models
description: Users with certain Android models have reported that the text input field becomes unresponsive during typing. This issue primarily affects communication and prevents users from sending messages or completing forms. A thorough investigation is required to resolve this bug across all impacted devices.

title: Implement Dark Mode for Nighttime Users to Reduce Eye Strain
description: Dark mode is being developed to improve usability for users who frequently access the app at night or in low-light environments. This feature will reduce eye strain and provide an alternative theme for more comfortable viewing. It is expected to increase user satisfaction and enhance the overall experience.

title: Screen Flicker Issue When Scrolling Through Images
description: A screen flicker issue occurs when users scroll through image galleries, causing a disruptive viewing experience. This bug affects various devices and requires an immediate fix to prevent users from facing further issues during media navigation.

title: Optimize Database Query for Faster Load Times on High Traffic Days
description: This feature aims to optimize the platform’s database queries, significantly improving load times during high traffic periods. By reducing delays, the platform will handle more concurrent users, ensuring smooth operation during peak times like product launches and major events.

title: Add Multi-Language Support for Global User Base Expansion
description: Adding multi-language support will allow users from different regions to interact with the platform in their preferred language. This feature is critical for expanding into new markets and enhancing the user experience for non-English speakers.

title: GPS Functionality Fails to Update Location on iPhone 12
description: Users have reported that the GPS fails to update their current location on iPhone 12 devices. This issue affects location-based features such as map updates and delivery tracking. A timely fix is needed to restore GPS functionality.

title: Fix Login Page Redirection Issues to Improve User Onboarding
description: Login page redirection issues have been reported by new users, causing confusion during the onboarding process. This fix will ensure proper redirection after authentication, improving the overall onboarding experience for new users.

title: App Fails to Load After Switching Between Wi-Fi and Mobile Data
description: When users switch between Wi-Fi and mobile data, the app occasionally fails to load. This bug significantly impacts user experience, especially for those who frequently switch networks while using the app.

title: Redesign Home Page Layout for a More Intuitive User Experience
description: The home page layout will be redesigned to make it more intuitive and user-friendly. The new design will streamline navigation and highlight key features, improving accessibility and engagement for all users.

title: In-App Purchases Not Reflecting in User Account
description: Some users are experiencing delays in their in-app purchases reflecting in their accounts. This issue impacts user satisfaction and revenue. A fix is required to ensure timely updates to the user’s account balance after a purchase.

title: Background Music Continues to Play After App is Closed
description: Background music continues to play even after the app is closed, leading to frustration for users. This bug disrupts the user experience and needs to be resolved to prevent unintended audio playback.

title: Improve API Error Handling for Better Third-Party Integration
description: Improving API error handling will provide clearer error messages and better documentation for third-party developers. This enhancement is necessary to reduce integration issues and improve developer satisfaction.

title: Upgrade Payment Gateway Integration to Enhance Security and Speed
description: Upgrading the payment gateway will improve both transaction security and speed, making the checkout process smoother and more secure for users. This update is essential for maintaining trust and improving overall transaction success rates.

title: Crash Occurs When Selecting Multiple Photos for Upload
description: When users attempt to select multiple photos for upload, the app crashes. This bug affects file uploads and media sharing, making it a high-priority issue to address.

title: Missing Icons on Home Screen After App Update
description: After a recent app update, several users reported missing icons on the home screen. This affects navigation and usability, requiring an urgent fix to restore the icons and maintain a functional interface.

title: Fix Search Functionality Bugs to Provide Accurate Search Results
description: This feature focuses on fixing bugs in the search functionality to improve accuracy and relevance of search results. By optimizing the search algorithm, users will receive more accurate responses to their queries.

title: Device Overheats When Using Augmented Reality Features
description: Users report that their devices overheat when using augmented reality features. This issue affects performance and can potentially damage the device, necessitating an immediate fix to optimize the AR features for lower heat generation.

title: Enhance Mobile Responsiveness for Seamless Cross-Device Experience
description: This feature will enhance the platform’s mobile responsiveness, ensuring a seamless experience across devices. Improvements include faster loading times and better adaptability to various screen sizes, improving usability for mobile users.

title: Text Message Notifications Delay on Android 13
description: Android 13 users are experiencing delays in receiving text message notifications. This issue disrupts communication and needs to be resolved to ensure timely message delivery across devices.

title: Battery Drain Increased After Recent Update
description: Since the last update, users have noticed increased battery drain, especially during prolonged use. This bug significantly affects mobile users and requires an optimization to reduce battery consumption.

title: Integrate Push Notifications to Keep Users Informed in Real-Time
description: Push notifications will be integrated to provide real-time updates to users. This feature is crucial for keeping users informed of new messages, events, and other important app updates, enhancing engagement and interactivity.

title: Inconsistent Font Rendering on Different Screen Resolutions
description: Font rendering issues have been observed on devices with varying screen resolutions, leading to an inconsistent user interface. This problem affects readability and visual appeal, requiring a fix to standardize the font rendering across all devices.
